entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
